column2: "Hm... it seems like none of the equipment here is functioning."
"It seems of ARKS origin, but it's all broken beyond recognition..."
"It looks like there's still one intact over here."
"Hey, dummy! Get back, we haven't cleared that area!"
"It's okay. Besides I'm a native creature to this planet, right?"
"Didn't you say you've never come down here before? Hurry up and get back here!"
"Hey babe, don't worry about me. I'm not a weakling like you."
"Oh hey, I think I see some light coming from back there...."
"W-what's that!? I've never seen anything like that!"
